function_description: Set up GitHub integration (Work In Progress)
initial_state: User is logged into the web app and viewing a specific board on the project dashboard with GitHub integration option visible.
steps: Locate the synchronization or update function button/icon in the settings bar.
Click on the button/icon to initiate GitHub integration setup.
Follow any additional prompts to complete the setup process.
expected_state: GitHub integration is set up for the board, though the function is marked as Work In Progress.
